properties.label: Deer Creek Gap
properties.description: on the Haywood County, N.C.-Cocke County, Tenn., line in Great Smoky Mountains National Park near lat. 35°43'04" N., long. 83°15' W.

properties.label: Horse Pen Ridge
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, a spur extending NW from Cataloochee Divide; its center is near lat. 35°35'40" N., long. 83°05'07" W.

properties.label: Locust Knob
properties.description: NE Swain County on Heintooga Ridge in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, lat. 35°33'27" N., long. 83°12'08" W. Alt. 4,034.

properties.label: Mount Love
properties.description: in Great Smoky Mountains National Park on the Swain County, N.C.-Sevier County, Tenn., line, lat. 35°33'30" N., long. 83°30' W. Named by Arnold Guyot before 1860 for Dr. S. L. Love (1828-87), who accompanied T. L. Clingman and S. O. Buckley in 1858 when Clingmans Dome was first measured. Alt. approx. 6,500.

properties.label: Mouse Creek
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, rises near lat. 35°42'22" N., long. 83°07'17" W., and flows NW into Big Creek. The name is an Indian one.
